description: SAIL API Validation Schema - Complete reference for all components, functions, parameters, and valid values

choiceValues.validation: cannot be null or empty strings
cannot be null or empty strings
cannot be null or empty strings

value.validation: Can only contain a!richTextItem, a!richTextIcon, a!richTextBulletedList, a!richTextNumberedList, or plain text

fields.type: List of Field References or a!aggregationFields

a!recordData.specialNote: ONLY use directly in a!gridField data parameter or chart data parameter - NEVER in local variables

a!encryptedTextField.specialNote: NOT compatible with synced record types - use a!textField with warning banner instead

a!scatterChartConfig.specialNote: Scatter charts ONLY work with a!recordData - cannot use categories + series

a!gridLayout.specialNote: For inline editing - use a!gridField for read-only display

a!isPageWidth.specialNote: Returns true if current viewport matches any of the specified widths - use for responsive design

a!chartCustomColorScheme.specialNote: Use hex color codes in the colors array

index.description: Get array element at index or default

text.description: Format value as text with pattern
text.specialNote: Cannot accept null values - use if() or a!defaultValue() to check first

a!isNotNullOrEmpty.description: Check if not null and not empty

union.description: All unique items from both arrays

difference.description: Items in array1 not in array2

todatasubset.description: Sort and paginate data using a!pagingInfo
todatasubset.specialNote: Returns DataSubset with data, startIndex, batchSize, sort, totalCount, and identifiers

wherecontains.description: Find indices where array contains value

a!flatten.description: Flatten nested arrays into single array

a!update.description: Immutably update array element at index

a!match.description: Pattern matching for cleaner conditional logic

datetime.syntax: datetime(year, month, day, hour, minute, second)

a!addDateTime.syntax: a!addDateTime(dateTime, years, months, days, hours, minutes, seconds)

a!subtractDateTime.syntax: a!subtractDateTime(dateTime, years, months, days, hours, minutes, seconds)

user.specialNote: Common properties: firstName, lastName, email, displayName

a!toJson.description: Convert SAIL value to JSON text

a!fromJson.description: Parse JSON text to SAIL value

a!jsonPath.description: Extract value from JSON using JSONPath expression

fixed.description: Format number with fixed decimal places
